page.title: 11Codnor Village Centre
page.content: In the middle of the Market Place is a clock tower over the public toilets. There are two public phone boxes too. Between High St and Alfreton Rd is a car park and opposite is the Clock Inn. Next to that is the park, then a house and the Sheehy Hall and another pub,The French Horn. There are new traffic lights here at the junction of Nottingham Road and Heanor Road. On the Market Place and High Street are some houses and lots of shops such as Codnor Pets,The Post Office,Codnor Gardens and DIY,Market News,a chemist, Logic Electrical,Family Footware,Alans Market Garden,Merrett's Off Licence,an antique shop and a bakery. Wright's butchery is on Alfreton Rd. At the top of Glasshouse Hill is Else's garage and a petrol station. Across the road is the video film hire shop next to The Glasshouse Inn. {JR
